location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch map of British Guiana showing area suggested for Assyrian settlement'

mods.abstract: Sketch map of British Guiana which accompanies the Foreign Office Memorandum on the Possibilities of Assyrian Settlement in the Rupununi District of British Guiana.The map shows boundary lines, railways, roads, cattle trails, savannahs, and Indian reservations, as well as the proposed area for Assyrian settlement.
